group_1.textRight: Whew... We had so much fun!
The only thing left to do is...
...the screening of the show@we performed in!

group_1.textLeft: ...It's almost time. We need to get ready@for the introductory speech.

group_1.textRight: Oh wow... I'm starting to get nervous.

group_1.textLeft: Why's that, Iroha?

group_1.textRight: Well, I guess I'm not nervous, actully...@It's more like I'm excited. *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: ...I need to get some water.@I'll be right back.
Hey, guys! We gotta huddle!

group_1.textRight: What for?

group_1.textLeft: We made a lot of good memories today@thanks to Master.
So I want to get a gift for her@to show her how we feel!
It'll be our way of saying@thanks for everything!

group_1.textRight: Oh, wow! That would be great!
Yes, I've been wanting@to thank Yachiyo, too.
She's been takin' care of us@all this time, after all.
But what exactly should@we get for her...?
We can only prepare so much@in the time we have...

group_1.textLeft: I've already got something!@The video I recorded today!

group_1.textRight: Huh? It's a little fast...are you just going@to give her the raw footage?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, we'll do something more!
We can make some quick edits,@mostly focusing on what we said to her.
Like, those times I had you guys@speak into the camera!

group_1.textRight: What? C-can we really get@that ready so quickly?

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing! I'll show you how!

group_1.textRight: You know...I want to give her@something else, too!

group_1.textLeft: Something else...? Since it's Tanabata, should@we get something appropriate for the occasion?

group_1.textRight: Tanabata... Tanabata... Orihime...@Hikoboshi... Stars? The Milky Way...?

group_1.textLeft: That reminds me, Yachiyo wanted to@see the Milky Way as well...
I wonder what time the planetarium@is open?
Even if it isn't the real thing, I think it'd make@her happy if we could all see the stars together...

group_1.textRight: Oh...! I think I know what to give her!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, nice! Whatcha thinking?

group_1.textRight: Let me see - I saw a video@on how to do it...

group_1.textCenter: I'm back. ...You look like you're having fun.@What are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100354:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Bwah! Master! It's nothing big, really!
Anyway, I think it's about time@we get going!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I suppose...
Sorry, but...can you guys please@get all the details sorted out?
Contact me once you have it@all figured out!

group_1.textRight: Will do!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, let's go!
...See you later, everyone.
